titles.title: Recognizing the thousands of Freemasons in every State in the Nation and honoring them for their many contributions to the Nation throughout its history.
Recognizing the thousands of Freemasons in every State in the Nation and honoring them for their many contributions to the Nation throughout its history.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Honors the thousands of Freemasons in every state for their contributions to the nation.
